elements.name: Add a valid Device to pool

steps.name: the login api and payload having account as "Conti_HQ" username as "Conti_HQ" and password as "Conti_HQ"
User sends Post https Request to login API
Verify status code is 200 and token is generated

Add APi and payload having device SR no, devicetype as 1, publicKey as "-----BEGIN PUBLIC KEY-----\r
MFkwEwYHKoZIzj0CAQYIKoZIzj0DAQcDQgAEtwADUKo8jGz48q+hfqXwugWkoGNd\r
bkOpD3TGW5tqRIyo6XAPetbOQ/b/cf/96AGehX+2QWsItukdmWsaDno7Mg==\r
-----END PUBLIC KEY-----", publicKeyType as "ES256_PEM"
User sends Post request to Add API
Status code should be 200 and user validates response body
the login api and payload having account as "Conti_HQ" username as "Conti_HQ" and password as "Conti_HQ"
User sends Post https Request to login API
Verify status code is 200 and token is generated

name: Login API should return 200 when success and 401 for invalid credentials

elements.name: Verify all required tabs are displayed under HQ

steps.name: User enters Account as "Conti_W" Username as "Conti_WS" and Password as "Conti_WS"
